name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#AZKi超生誕祭2021 ゲスト：角巻わため／桃鈴ねね [RyrHynHHbmY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: MC section with AZKi, Tsunomaki Watame, and Momosuzu Nene. They introduce Nene and talk about AZKi's birthday before the solo performances begin.
Momosuzu Nene performs her solo song 'Lunch with me' while AZKi and Watame watch from seats on the stage.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！来てくれてありがとう！楽しむぜ！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thank you for coming! Let's have some fun!

subtitles.original: はい！ホロライブ五期生、オレンジ担当の桃鈴ねねです！よろしくね！
subtitles.english: Yes! I'm Momosuzu Nene from Hololive 5th Generation, in charge of orange! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: あず先輩呼んでくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: AZKi-senpai, thank you for inviting me!

subtitles.original: おめでとー！おめでとー！
来てくれてありがとうございます。
あのですね、今日はね、AZKiの生誕配信ということでですね、
subtitles.english: Well, today is AZKi's birthday stream, so...

subtitles.original: お近くで、間近で、間近で、間近でですね、
subtitles.english: I wanted to see you from close by, very close, very close, very close...

subtitles.original: あずおじ。そうです。今日はあずおじ担当です。
subtitles.english: Azo-ji. That's right. I'm in charge of Azo-ji today.
